info.name: shiftyy's MyAnimeList Dark+
info.description: (Works only on MyAnimeList Profile and Anime/Manga pages). A simple dark recolor of mal profile page + some other design changes. Main Features: -Customizable Background Color/Image -Customizable Font Color/Size -Customizable Progress Graphs Color -Customizable Smaller "MAL" Logo -Hide "About Me" Section (Optional) -Hide "Favorites" Section (Optional) -Remove RSS Feeds Feel free to give me feedback or report any bug/inconsistency!
info.additionalInfo:
[29/11/2021]
  -Better Workaround for RSS.
  -Anime Compatibility Patched.
  -Footer Border Fix.
  -Footer Privacy Policy and Terms of Service Colors Changed.
  -Edit Profile and Report Button Color Changed.
[28/11/2021]
  -New Animated Backgrounds Presets.
  -Santa Hat Green Background Removed.
  -Better Workaround for Page Footer.
  -Page Footer Colors and Alpha Changed.
  -Notification Buttons Colors Changed.
  -Search button background Alpha Increased.
  -Anime/Manga List button Alpha Increased.
  -Default Secondary Font Color Changed.
[24/10/2021]
  -Halloween Theme Artifacts patched.
[17/09/2021]
  -More Background Darkness Options
[15/07/2021]
  -Custom Logo Support
[13/07/2021]
  -Anime/Manga Page Support (Beta)
